name: Pre SQL
Post SQL
value:
INSERT INTO cdp_rdm.CDP_DRIVER_SCHEDULE
(audit_id, job, run_stts_cd, valuation_start_dtm, valuation_end_dtm, run_start_dtm, run_end_dtm, row_insert_dtm)
VALUES ((select * from (select max(audit_id)+1 from cdp_rdm.CDP_DRIVER_SCHEDULE )AA),
'CDP',
'P',
(select * from (select max(cast(run_end_dtm as date)) from cdp_rdm.CDP_DRIVER_SCHEDULE)BB),
(select * from (select date_add(max(cast(run_end_dtm as date)), INTERVAL 1 DAY) from cdp_rdm.CDP_DRIVER_SCHEDULE)CC),
null,
null,
current_timestamp);
